mapper.select: select t.id,t.name,'API' as executionModule, ifnull(t2.name,'LOCAL') as actuator, t1.`name` as executor,t.create_time as executionTime, ifnull(t.trigger_mode,'MANUAL') as triggerMode ,ifnull(t.status,'Saved') as executionStatus from api_definition_exec_result t left join `user` t1 ON t.user_id = t1.id left join test_resource_pool t2 on t.actuator = t2.id left join api_test_case t4 on t4.id = t.resource_id where t4.id=#{id} and t.content != "" order by t.create_time desc LIMIT 5;

select t.id,if(t.scenario_id like "[\"%\"]", t.name,t.scenario_name) as name ,'SCENARIO' as executionModule, ifnull(t2.name,'LOCAL') as actuator, t1.`name` as executor,t.create_time as executionTime, t.trigger_mode as triggerMode ,t.status as executionStatus from api_scenario_report t left join `user` t1 ON t.user_id = t1.id left join test_resource_pool t2 on t.actuator = t2.id where t.execute_type ='Debug' and t.scenario_id=#{id} ORDER BY t.create_time desc LIMIT 5;

SELECT name FROM api_scenario_report WHERE actuator =#{actuator} AND `status` in ('Running','Waiting')
UNION ALL
SELECT name FROM api_definition_exec_result WHERE actuator = #{actuator} AND `status` in ('Running','Waiting')
